answers.answer: There are several types/classes of diabetes. Without knowing which one/s your grandparent/s fall into it makes it difficult for anyone to answer your concerns fully.Go here and educate yourself on diabetes. After reading the ADA web site in its entirety you should have better understanding on how you can help them.http://www.diabetes.org/diabetes-basics/?loc=GlobalNavDB
